title: Koopa Troopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Troopa March**: Visit someone, you will attack them, if they are visited by someone performing a protective action, deal a Powerful attack to the visitor instead.
- 
- **Shell Throw**: Throw your Shell away, Modkilling yourself to deal a Powerful Rampaging Astral attack to a target and your visitors, Can only be used if you have your Shell.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start with a 1 time use Shell, if you were to die, you will lose it and survive, but your defense will be reduced to None.

desc:
Post 1278
*Common soldiers in Bowser's army, Koopa Troopas can retreat into their shells.*
